intro: When I'm not coding my next project, I enjoy spending my time doing any on the following:
interest1: I love Cooking. I love to create Asian American fusion dishes.
interest2: I'm a bookworm and fan of Philosophy, Science Fiction, Fictional, and Mystery genre.
interest3: I'm an avid fan of video games. Currently, I'm playing Apex Legends. If you're interested you can see my gameplays here.
interest4: I'm eager to learn new technologies and new skills.
